title: Salvatore
author: Lana Del Rey
lyrics:
[00:41.85] All the lights in Miami begin to gleam
[00:48.75] Ruby, blue and green, neon too
[00:57.53] Everything looks better from above, my king
[01:04.59] Like aquamarine, oceans blue
[01:12.74] Ah-ah-ah-ah, ah-ah-ah-ah
[01:16.59] Cacciatore
[01:20.73] La-da-da-da-da, la-da-da-da-da
[01:24.74] Limousines
[01:28.68] Ah-ah-ah-ah, ah-ah-ah-ah
[01:32.75] Ciao, amore
[01:36.53] La-da-da-da-da, la-da-da-da-da
[01:40.63] Soft ice cream
[01:45.68] All the lights are sparkling for you, it seems
[01:52.55] On the downtown scenes, shady blue
[02:01.55] Beatboxing and rapping in the summer rain
[02:08.67] Like a boss, you sang jazz and blues
[02:16.73] Ah-ah-ah-ah, ah-ah-ah-ah
[02:20.81] Cacciatore
[02:24.61] La-da-da-da-da, la-da-da-da-da
[02:28.74] Limousines
[02:32.66] Ah-ah-ah-ah, ah-ah-ah-ah
[02:36.63] Ciao, amore
[02:40.63] La-da-da-da-da, la-da-da-da-da
[02:44.73] Soft ice cream
[02:48.71] The summer's wild and I've been waiting for you all this time
[02:55.97] I adore you, can't you see you're meant for me?
[03:04.42] The summer's hot but I've been cold without you
[03:09.83] I was so wrong not to doubt your Medell√≠n, tangerine dreams
[03:20.73] Catch me if you can, working on my tan, Salvatore
[03:28.58] Dying by the hand of a foreign man, happily
[03:36.75] Calling out my name in the summer rain, ciao, amore
[03:44.69] Salvatore can wait, now it's time to eat soft ice cream
[03:52.84] Ah-ah-ah-ah, ah-ah-ah-ah
[03:56.99] Cacciatore
[04:00.78] Ah-ah-ah-ah, ah-ah-ah-ah
[04:04.88] Limousines
[04:08.99] Ah-ah-ah-ah, ah-ah-ah-ah
[04:12.80] Ciao, amore
[04:16.83] Ah-ah-ah-ah, ah-ah-ah-ah
[04:22.08] Soft ice cream
[04:24.86]
